definitions.body: [[חדק]] (√of foll.; NH, Aram. in deriv.; cf. Ar. s.adaqa speak the truth (also s.adqun hard, even, straight, perfect); Sab. [[חדק]] just, epith. of king Mordtm:ZMG xxx (1876), 37 Hom:Chrest. 125; usu. excellent DHM:ZMG xxix (1875), 595, 590 CIS:iv. p. 176; also verb favour, endow (one with something) CIS:iv. No. 198 l. 4 DHM:1. c. Mordtm:Him. Inschr. 70 f.; Ph. [[חדק]] adj. just, right, TelAm (Can.) ṣaduḳ, innocent OAram. [[חדק]] n. righteousness, loylty, Nab. [[אחדק]] adj. authorized, Palm. [[זדקתא]] eu)sebh/v; Saho sadaḳ, be true, clear Reinisch:Saho Spr, (1890) 312; Eth. s.adaqa: be just, righteous, so NH [[חדק]] Pi. Hiph., Aram. [[חְדֵיק]], zdaq; cf. Kau:Deriv. d.
